name: Sex
description: Sex is a TV series starring Asta Kamma August, Jonathan Bergholdt Jørgensen, and Kitt Maiken Mortensen. After a magical night and an innocent kiss on a rooftop, Cathrine (22) is paralyzed with confusion and desire. At home she has...
keywords: boyfriend girlfriend relationship,lesbian interest,man's girlfriend attracted to another woman,love triangle,man bisexual woman lesbian woman love triangle

review.name: An interesting small buget look on the complexity of love and sex
review.reviewBody:
This series offers us an insight in the life of the young Danish woman Cathrine. She has a boyfriend, Simon and she works at a sex helpline. Ironically her own sex life falls short. This offers the starting point for the humble and intimous storyline of the series.

'Sex' succeeds in making us part of the up-and-downs of a realistic love relationship. With especially great acting of lead actrice Asta Kamma August. Although not every episode is sharp enough and the episodes are sometimes too short (~15min) to fully support the rythm of the storyline.

However, this series stands out with some great cinematography that is just enough balanced for the simple and low budget story. 7/10 good, but not great.
